Hotel.Name: Sandals Regency La Toc Golf Resort & Spa - All Inclusive
Hotel.Description: Set on green hills and a coral bluff above a long crescent-shaped beach, this resort for active adult couples is less than two miles from Castries, the lively capital of St. Lucia.

Hotel.Name: Sandals Grande St. Lucian Spa & Beach Resort - All Inclusive
Stonefield Estate Resort
Hotel.Description: Imagine spectacular views of St. Lucia, the most beautiful island in the Caribbean, of the Pitons, a dramatic World Heritage Site, and of breathtaking sunsets, all from the comfort of your hammock. Imagine gourmet meals of fresh, locally caught fish, locally grown fruits and vegetables, and exotic spices. Imagine plantation luxury, in one of 16 large, custom designed villas built to maximize the views and filled with hand made and antique hardwood furnishings, shutters, and mosquito nets. Imagine unique resort indulgences, including outdoor showers, hammocks, Caribbean sunsets, and 26 acres of flowers and mango trees. * Airport ST LUCIA VIGIE APT - 10miles * ST L City - 10miles * Airport ST LUCIA VIGIE APT - 26miles
Hotel.RoomRatePlanDescription: Ocean View Pool Villa (1 Bedroom with A/C)

Hotel.Name: Auberge Seraphine
Hotel.Description: The Auberge Seraphine, a elegant, twenty four room hotel overlooks the blue waters of Vigie Yacht Marina in St Lucia.

Hotel.Name: Capella Marigot Bay Resort and Marina Saint Lucia
Cap Maison Resort & Spa
Hotel.Description:
On the Caribbean island of St.Lucia, known worldwide for its natural beauty, Cap Maison is in a truly breathtaking location in one of St.Luciaâs most desirable areas. Set atop a private ocean-front bluff with magical ocean and sunset views over the clear blue waters of the Caribbean Sea, Cap Maison is a lovingly created boutique hotel combining luxury, elegance, charm, and uncompromising standards of five star personal service.
Maximising its incomparable position within three acres of tropical landscaped gardens and a sandy secluded beach below, Cap Maison offers a private retreat in luxurious accommodation, many with private roof terraces and pools, but it is also close enough to many attractions to entice the more adventurous. The St Lucia Golf & Country Club and the St. Lucia Kite Surfing centre are both minutes away, tennis adjacent, and the restaurants and bars of Rodney Bay are but a short drive.



This property has provided all content and is solely responsible for its accuracy.

Hotel.Name: Fond Doux Plantation & Resort
Hotel.Description:
• These St Lucia cottages are less than 2 miles from the Pitons World Heritage Site and 3 miles from downtown Soufriere.

  • Individual cottages at Fond Doux have furnished verandas, refrigerators, and coffeemakers; bathrooms have showers only.

  • The Fond Doux Plantation features daily complimentary Continental breakfast, an outdoor pool, a poolside bar, and 2 restaurants.

Location.StreetAddress: P O Box RB2407 Bonaire Estate,

Hotel.Name: Bay Gardens Beach Resort
Hotel.Description:
• This Caribbean-French-style St. Lucia hotel sits on Reduit Beach, a mile from Rodney Bay and Pigeon Island National Historic Park.

  • Guestrooms at Bay Gardens Beach Resort offer coffeemakers and refrigerators, furnished balconies or patios, and DVD players.

  • A spa tub punctuates the center of the lagoon-style pool. Bay Gardens Beach Resort includes 2 restaurants and 3 bars, 1 poolside.
Hotel.RoomRatePlanDescription: Deluxe Room, 2 Queen Beds, Pool View - Full Breakfast

Hotel.Name: St. James's Club Morgan Bay All Inclusive

Promotion.Description: Stay 3 nights and get the 3rd night free

Hotel.Name: The Landings St. Lucia - All Suite Resort
Hotel.Description:
• The Landings is 5 km (3 mi) from Rodney Bay, a 10-minute drive from St. Lucia's Rodney Bay Village and 20 minutes from downtown Castries.

  • Accommodations at The Landings St. Lucia offer kitchens, Italian marble and tile, and 700-thread-count bedding.

  • Residences frame a free-form lagoon that hosts 80 yacht slips. The property includes 7 pools and a full-service health spa.

Hotel.Name: The Ginger Lily Hotel

Location.StreetAddress: Rodney Bay Village PO Box cp6013

Hotel.Description:
• Reduit Beach is 100 meters (325 feet) from this St. Lucia hotel, which is 3 km (less than 2 mi) from Pigeon Island National Park.

  • Guestrooms at Ginger Lily Hotel offer in-room safes, hair dryers, and separate sitting areas furnished with sofa beds.

  • Tropical plants surround a patio with a kidney-shaped pool. Ginger Lily's on-site restaurant serves breakfast and tropical drinks.

Hotel.Name: Marigot Beach Club and Dive Resort
St Lucian by rex resorts - All-Inclusive
Bay Gardens Hotel

Location.StreetAddress: Reduit Beach Avenue, Rodney Bay Village

Hotel.RoomRatePlanDescription: Executive Suite, 1 King Bed - Full Breakfast

Hotel.Name: The Still Beach House
Hotel.Description: Nestle at the northern end of Soufriere bay sandy beach is The Still Beach Resort. This quaint, family operated, beach side resort boast a beautiful and comfortable atmosphere to create the perfect holiday mood for those looking to escape and relax. The soothing Caribbean beachfront is a gentle footstep away, which will allow you to wash away lifes everyday pressures. The resort boasts 5 comfortable rooms with four-poster king size beds, three of which are self-contained with in suite kitchen and living rooms. All rooms are decorated in an inviting, warm Caribbean style. The rooms open up to a balcony with a magnificent view of Petit Piton and the Caribbean Sea. For snorkellers, Soufrieres northern bay offers outstanding and fascinating marine life. For a unique, ecological experience, the family operated working plantation open to our guest and anyone interested in seeing the daily working life of a Tropical Plantation

Location.StreetAddress: Flamboyant Road, Reduite Beach Avenue Rodney Bay

Palm Haven Hotel is a boutique hotel which is smartly nestled not too far away from the touristy hot spot of Rodney Bay, affording vistas directly opposite the Rodney Bay Marina. Unwind in our fashionably relaxed ambiance, away from the hustleÃ¢??n bustle district; minutes away from the Gros Islet Friday Night Street Party and Pigeon Island.

Location.StreetAddress: Crn of Old Military Rd and Habitat Drv.

Hotel.Description: Habitat Terrace provides a tranquil and relaxing environment for guest with every possible modern facility. Incorporated into a beautifully landscaped tropical garden, the well appointed spacious rooms with large picture windows and doors allow the constant cool breeze and afford stunning views of the lush green mountains.
